info.title: TD/OMS - Task API
info.description: The TD/OMS Task API allows you to interact with a task. You can Create, Change or Delete a task. Also other actions like Copy, Connect, Disconnect, Ratify, Complete and Status Recalculations are available.

port.description: The port to which the server is listening

status.description: The return status which can be *NORM or *TERM. In case of *TERM look at the messages for more information.

externalDocs.description:
*SAME Use this value to indicate that the release number
does not change. TD/OMS will try to find the best value for the element if a new fix is added and the
value *SAME is used. 
*CURRUNT Use this value to indicate that the release of the fix is the current release from the application definition.

-1 the value does not change (*SAME)
-2 Use the current date (*CURRENT)
0 do not set a date

-1 the value does not change (*SAME)
-2 Use the current date (*CURRENT)
0 do not set a date

-1 the value does not change (*SAME)
-2 Use the current date (*CURRENT)
0 do not set a date

sendMessageToProgrammer.description: Send a message to the programmer when assigning or reassigning with '1'. Use '0' to not send a message.

updateDb.description: Specify '1' to update the database or '0' to not update but check only.

updateBuffer.description: Specify '1' to update the returned data with the lastest values or '0' to not return the latest task data.

addProcessingOptions.description: Input processing options for action add

interfaceLevel.description: The interface level must be V3R0M0

externalDocs.description:
*SAME Use this value to indicate that the release number
does not change. TD/OMS will try to find the best value for the element if a new fix is added and the
value *SAME is used. 
*CURRUNT Use this value to indicate that the release of the fix is the current release from the application definition.

-1 the value does not change (*SAME)
-2 Use the current date (*CURRENT)
0 do not set a date

-1 the value does not change (*SAME)
-2 Use the current date (*CURRENT)
0 do not set a date

-1 the value does not change (*SAME)
-2 Use the current date (*CURRENT)
0 do not set a date

-1 the value does not change (*SAME)
0 number of hours will not be filled (*NONE)

longDescription.description: *SAME Use this value to indicate that long description does not change.

interfaceLevel.description: The interface level must be V3R0M0

hourCounter.description: Specify '1' if you want to add the hours, '2' if you want to substract the hours and '0' to replace the hours.

updateDb.description: Specify '1' to update the database or '0' to not update but check only.

updateBuffer.description: Specify '1' to update the returned data with the lastest values or '0' to not return the latest task data.

changeProcessingOptions.description: Input processing options for action change

externalDocs.description:
*SAME Use this value to indicate that the reason code does not change. TD/OMS will try to find the best value for the element if a fix is completed and the value *SAME is used.
*DFT Use this value to indicate that the default reason code is to be used to complete the fix. The default reason code is user-defined.

interfaceLevel.description: The interface level must be V3R0M0

updateDb.description: Specify '1' to update the database or '0' to not update but check only.

updateBuffer.description: Specify '1' to update the returned data with the lastest values or '0' to not return the latest task data.

updateDb.description: Specify '1' to update the database or '0' to not update but check only.

updateBuffer.description: Specify '1' to update the returned data with the lastest values or '0' to not return the latest task data.

connectProcessingOptions.description: Input processing option for action connect

interfaceLevel.description: The interface level must be V3R0M0

updateDb.description: Specify '1' to update the database or '0' to not update but check only.

updateBuffer.description: Specify '1' to update the returned data with the lastest values or '0' to not return the latest task data.

disconnectProcessingOptions.description: Input processing options for action disconnect

interfaceLevel.description: The interface level must be V3R0M0

copySolutions.description: When Copy, specify '1' if you want to place the solutions of the copied task  into the connection list of the new task.

toApplicationCode.description: Used for copying a fix to another application.

updateDb.description: Specify '1' to update the database or '0' to not update but check only.

ratificationCode.description: Specify '1' for a positive ratification and '0 'for a negative ratification.

ratificationGroup.description: Enter the ratification group for which you want to do the ratification. You must be a member of the ratification group. Otherwise, your ratification is not accepted.

updateDb.description: Specify '1' to update the database or '0' to not update but check only.
